overview: In this irreverent comedy, a failed actor-turned-worse-high-school-drama-teacher rallies his Tucson, AZ students as he conceives and stages politically incorrect musical sequel to Shakespeare's Hamlet.
tagline: One high school drama teacher is about to make a huge number 2.
cast: Steve Coogan|Catherine Keener|J. J. Soria|Skylar Astin|Phoebe Strole
